description: I was able to set up one ftp site, but I have more than 1 domain. How do I set up ftp access for each site? How do I delete or edit or add sites in the drop down menu?
summary: How do I access more than one ftp site?

description:
No idea how this "Taxi" is supposed to work after connecting to the remote side. Cannot even drag-drop to copy files.
Local, can't create folders, no "back" button, no "home" button. No upload/download option.
Remote (SFTP) can't create folders, no "back" button, no "home" button. No upload/download option. Useless checkboxes and "Open" option.
Can connect to a remote SFTP. Can traverse local and remove directories. Has bookmark option.
summary: Missing basic features, like file transfer

description:
1. Awkward UI.
2. Download only for for files, not directories
3. Drag and drop is broken
I was able to connect fairly easily and transfer the files I need. Very easy to use.
summary: Simple but does what I need

description: I downloaded this to transfer files between my 3DS and PC and it works absolutely fine. Drag and drop worked fine too.
summary: Worked for what I needed it to do

description: I was able to open the app, and connect via SFTP to a remote server, select a directory to transfer, but neither dragging/dropping or pressing the transfer button would start the copy into my local home directory.
Mir gefällt das reduzierte Interface. Wer schnell ein paar Dateien auf einen FTP-Server schieben muss wird hier glücklich.
Interfaces limpia y muy bonita agradable al usar, se echa de menos algo que indique en que porcentaje de la transferencia va.
summary: Bastante minimalista y cumple con su funcion

description: Fácil de usar, con una interfaz sencilla, pero cumple con su Cometido.
Работает как должно, не перегружено настройками. Рекомендую
